properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your only Son, no sin to hide, But You have sent Him from Your side. To walk upon this guilty sod, And to become the Lamb of God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lamb of God, sweet Lamb of God. I love the holy Lamb of God. O wash me in His precious blood. My Jesus Christ, the Lamb of God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your gift of love, they crucified, They laughed and scorned Him as He died. The humble King they named a fraud, And sacrificed the Lamb of God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lamb of God, sweet Lamb of God. I love the holy Lamb of God. O wash me in His precious blood. My Jesus Christ, the Lamb of God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I was so lost, I should have died, But You have brought me to Your side. To be led by Your staff and rod, And ever call on the Lamb of God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lamb of God, sweet Lamb of God. I love the holy Lamb of God. O wash me in His precious blood. My Jesus Christ, the Lamb of God.{/lang-eng}
